bioghist.p: David Chudwin was a reporter and editor for theMichigan Daily, student newspaper of the University of Michigan.

scopecontent.p: The Chudwin papers consists of leaflets and newsletters collected relating to campus issues, especially concerning the protest over the war in Vietnam, the debate over the propriety of University classified research, the ecology movement, the Black Action Movement, and the activities of various radical groups. Also included are transcripts of interviews conducted on the issue of classified research.
